Your rank is calculated by a state-of-the-art algorithm which takes in the number of views your article has got, the number of times it has been shared on social media, number of comments it has got on different platforms and the number of articles you have written in the past week.
Be consistent in your blogging - post a blog weekly
Promote your blog post on all the Facebook groups that you are part of
Seek an opinion from peers and edit the blog post accordingly
Share blog posts using the buttons for social sharing in your blog post
Add Social Plugins to your profile e.g. www.twitter.com/bloggername
Try to edit and focus on the content while sharing your blog post
Use appropriate hashtags
Add a line urging readers to follow you at the end of every blog, if they enjoyed reading it
Ask readers who frequently engage with your blog through comments, to follow you
Share your blog across all networks you are a part of, such as Facebook, Whatsapp and so on

OKAY BLOG TITLE This is like a title of your digital book and encompasses a description of all your blog posts that you\'ll be publishing here. Eg: Mums diary, My monologue. ADD VIDEO WRITE AN ARTICLE SUGGESTED TOPICS BECOME A BLOGGER
LET\'S GET STARTED
BECOME A BLOGGER
HOW CAN YOU CONTRIBUTE?
DO YOU GET PAID FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTION?
WHO CAN CONTRIBUTE?
You are one click away from sharing your thoughts, opinions, and stories on India\'s largest parenting community, in the language of your choice. With a reach of over 8 million Mums per month, your voice can be the source of hope, inspiration, comfort and knowledge.
You can share your parenting stories via the website or our iOS and Android app. Express yourself in the language of your choice - English, Hindi, Bengali, Marathi, Telugu or Tamil.
Momspresso does not pay each blogger on publishing their own posts. We do however offer paid writing assignments which are commissioned by brands. This is offered to bloggers based on the quality of content they produce.
Whether your story is about parenthood, womanhood, relationships, struggles, joys or personal well-being, this is the platform to write about it. Join the 5000+ Mums in seeking & sharing advice, opinions and recommendations.\n Do refrain from publishing copied or \'slightly modified\' content.
SHARE A MomVlog\n THAT CAPTURES #MOMLIFE Parenting, Work, Relationships, Fitness, Recipes, Beauty… basically anything Inspiring from day to day life. Shoot the video and upload it right away from your Mobile. LET\'S START

Your trekking to Stok Kangri begins with the arrival to Leh. You can easily reach Leh once you come to Delhi. You can reach Leh from Delhi either through a flight or through the road. Taking the flight is a better option as you would be saving a lot on time and energy. Taking the road may cost you a lot of time as you have to first go to either Srinagar or Manali to start for Leh. You can spend a day in Leh to acclimatize to the weather. Trekking in the area of Leh is among the best options among Trekking in India Trekking to Stok Kangri begins with the arrival to Leh. You can easily reach Leh once you come to Delhi. You can reach Leh from Delhi either through a flight Taking the flight is a better option as you would be saving a lot on time and energy. Taking the road may cost you a lot of time as you have to first go to either Srinagar or Manali to start for Leh. You can spend a day in Leh to acclimatize to the weather. Trekking in the area of Leh is among the best options among Trekking in India WRITE A 100 WORD STORY ADD A COMMENT Write an exciting title that suits your story. Character limit is 60.
